taskDescription:
Use the slope formula to find the slope of the line through the pair of points <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">(-3, 4)</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>2</mn>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">(2, -1)</annotation></semantics></math>.
